channel.title: CVE Feed for publify -- publify/publify
channel.description: The latest CVEs for publify -- publify/publify

item.title: CVE-2022-1810|2024-08-03T00:16:59.904Z -- publify -- publify%2Fpublify
item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key in GitHub repository publify/publify prior to 9.2.9.

item.title: CVE-2022-1812|2024-08-03T00:17:00.365Z -- publify -- publify%2Fpublify
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound in GitHub repository publify/publify prior to 9.2.10.

item.title: CVE-2022-1553|2024-08-03T00:10:03.456Z -- publify -- publify%2Fpublify
item.description: Leaking password protected articles content due to improper access control in GitHub repository publify/publify prior to 9.2.8. Attackers can leverage this vulnerability to view the contents of any password-protected article present on the publify website, compromising confidentiality and integrity of users.

item.title: CVE-2022-1811|2024-08-03T00:16:59.877Z -- publify -- publify%2Fpublify
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type in GitHub repository publify/publify prior to 9.2.9.

item.title: CVE-2022-2815|2024-08-03T00:52:59.056Z -- publify -- publify%2Fpublify
item.description: Insecure Storage of Sensitive Information in GitHub repository publify/publify prior to 9.2.10.
